content.text:
[@punkmonk](@EaYYQo5nAQRabB9nxAn5i2uiIZ665b90Qk2U/WHNVE8=.ed25519)

I'm not an expert, but I think the envelope can have `Message-ID:` and `In-Reply-To:` properties that you use to identify a which message you're replying to. For example:

```
In-Reply-To: <d4436bce-fd8b-484d-8aaf-a8a219818006@www.fastmail.com>
Subject: RE: Research Invitation: Testing Research Software
Date: Tue, 27 Aug 2019 22:58:17 +0200
Message-ID: <006d01d55d1c$eb922a70$c2b67f50$@icon.co.za>
```
